source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 'ProductKit' AS B_CLASSNAME,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
CAST(CreatedDateTimeUtc as DateTime) AS CREATED_DATE_TIME_UTC,
KitAdditionalDimensions AS KIT_ADDITIONAL_DIMENSIONS,
KitAfiFeatureBullet1English AS KIT_AFI_FT_BULLET1_ENG,
KitAfiFeatureBullet2English AS KIT_AFI_FT_BULLET2_ENG,
KitAfiFeatureBullet3English AS KIT_AFI_FT_BULLET3_ENG,
KitAfiFeatureBullet4English AS KIT_AFI_FT_BULLET4_ENG,
KitAfiFeatureBullet5English AS KIT_AFI_FT_BULLET5_ENG,
KitAfiFeatureBullet6English AS KIT_AFI_FT_BULLET6_ENG,
KitAfiFeatureBullet7English AS KIT_AFI_FT_BULLET7_ENG,
KitAFIImageSet AS KIT_AFI_IMAGE_SET,
KitAlternateDescription2 AS KIT_ALTER_DESC2,
KitAlternateDescription3 AS KIT_ALTER_DESC3,
KitAlternateAFIFluff1 AS KIT_ALTERNATE_AFI_FLUFF1,
CAST(KitAmazonBrandOwner AS nvarchar(256)) AS KIT_AMAZON_BRAND_OWNER,
CAST(KitARVRReady as nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_ARVR_READY,
CAST(KitAshcommDeliveryMode as nvarchar(4)) AS KIT_ASHCOMM_DELIVERY_MODE,
KitAssemblyInstructionsInternal AS KIT_ASM_INSTR_INTERNAL,
KitAssemblyInstructionsPublic AS KIT_ASM_INSTR_PUBLIC,
KitATPSeries AS KIT_ATP_SERIES,
KitAXKitNumber AS KIT_AX_KIT_NUMBER,
KitBoxQty AS KIT_BOX_QTY,
KitCartonDensity AS KIT_CARTON_DENSITY,
CAST(KitCartonDepthIn AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_CARTON_DEPTH_IN,
CAST(KitCartonDepthMm AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_CARTON_DEPTH_MM,
KitCartonFreightClass AS KIT_CARTON_FREIGHT_CLASS,
CAST(KitCartonHeightIn AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_CARTON_HEIGHT_IN,
CAST(KitCartonHeightMm AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_CARTON_HEIGHT_MM,
KitCartonVolume AS KIT_CARTON_VOLUME,
CAST(KitCartonWidthIn AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_CARTON_WIDTH_IN,
CAST(KitCartonWidthMm AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_CARTON_WIDTH_MM,
CAST(KitClassKey  as nvarchar(256)) AS KIT_CLASS_KEY,
KitCodeKey AS KIT_CODE_KEY,
KitColorKey AS KIT_COLOR_KEY,
KitColorSwatch AS KIT_COLOR_SWATCH,
CAST(KitCommodity AS nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_COMMODITY,
KitComponentQuantity AS KIT_COMPONENT_QUANTITY,
KitConditionalHomeDeliveryEligible AS KIT_COND_HOME_DELIV_ELIG,
KitConsumerAssembly AS KIT_CONSUMER_ASSEMBLY,
KitConsumerDescriptionEnglish AS KIT_CONSUMER_DESC_ENG,
KitCubesFt AS KIT_CUBES_FT,
KitCubesM AS KIT_CUBES_M,
CAST(KitDead AS nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_DEAD,
KitDefaultGroupingLookupCodeKey AS KIT_DFLT_GROUP_CODE_KEY,
KitDimensionSketch AS KIT_DIMENSION_SKETCH,
CAST(KitDimensionsConfirmed AS nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_DIMENSIONS_CONFIRMED,
KitDiningChairQtyCtn AS KIT_DINING_CHAIR_QTY_CTN,
KitEcomMerchantNotes AS KIT_ECOM_MERCHANT_NOTES,
CAST(KitEligibleforProtectionPlan AS nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_ELIG_PROTECTION_PLAN,
KitEngineeringDivisionKey AS KIT_ENGINEER_DIVISION_KEY,
CAST(KitExclusive AS nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_EXCLUSIVE,
KitExclusiveComment AS KIT_EXCLUSIVE_COMMENT,
CAST(KitExpressShip as nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_EXPRESS_SHIP,
KitFamilyofBusinessKey AS KIT_FAMILYOF_BUSINESS_KEY,
KitFluffAFIEnglish AS KIT_FLUFF_AFI_ENGLISH,
KitFluffPrintEnglish AS KIT_FLUFF_PRINT_ENGLISH,
KitFOBBasePrice AS KIT_FOB_BASE_PRICE,
KitForecastPlannerID AS KIT_FORECAST_PLANNER_ID,
KitFriendlyDescriptionEnglish AS KIT_FRIENDLY_DESC_ENG,
KitFriendlyDimensions AS KIT_FRIENDLY_DIMENSIONS,
KitFutureStatus AS KIT_FUTURE_STATUS,
KitGeneralDescriptionID AS KIT_GEN_DESC_ID,
KitGeneralLongDescription AS KIT_GEN_LONG_DESC,
KitGoogleTitle AS KIT_GOOGLE_TITLE,
KitHomeStoreAssemblyVideo1 AS KIT_HOMESTORE_ASM_VIDEO1,
KitHomestoreProductLine AS KIT_HOMESTORE_PDT_LINE,
KitHomstoreFeatureBullet1English AS KIT_HS_FT_BULLET1_ENG,
KitHomstoreFeatureBullet2English AS KIT_HS_FT_BULLET2_ENG,
KitHomstoreFeatureBullet3English AS KIT_HS_FT_BULLET3_ENG,
KitHomstoreFeatureBullet4English AS KIT_HS_FT_BULLET4_ENG,
KitHomstoreFeatureBullet5English AS KIT_HS_FT_BULLET5_ENG,
KitHomstoreFeatureBullet6English AS KIT_HS_FT_BULLET6_ENG,
KitHomstoreFeatureBullet7English AS KIT_HS_FT_BULLET7_ENG,
KitHomstoreFeatureBullet8English AS KIT_HS_FT_BULLET8_ENG,
KitHomestoreKitFluffEnglish AS KIT_HS_KIT_FLUFF_ENG,
KitHTSCode AS KIT_HTS_CODE,
KitID AS KIT_ID,
KitImportDomesticKey AS KIT_IMPORT_DOMESTIC_KEY,
CAST(KitIsProtectionPlan as nvarchar(256)) AS KIT_IS_PROTECTION_PLAN,
CAST(KitKeyKit AS nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_KEY_KIT,
KitKnockout AS KIT_KNOCKOUT,
KitMaterialEnglish AS KIT_MATERIAL_ENGLISH,
KitMfgWarranty AS KIT_MFG_WARRANTY,
KitNotAvailableforIndividualSale AS KIT_NOT_AVBL_INDIV_SALE,
KitNumber AS KIT_NUMBER,
KitPartsDrawings AS KIT_PARTS_DRAWINGS,
KitPhoto AS KIT_PHOTO,
KitPKLegacySellablePackage AS KIT_PK_LEG_SELLABLE_PKG,
KitPrimaryLifestyle AS KIT_PRIMARY_LIFESTYLE,
CAST(KitProductDepthIn AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_PRODUCT_DEPTH_IN,
CAST(KitProductDepthMm AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_PRODUCT_DEPTH_MM,
CAST(KitProductHeightIn AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_PRODUCT_HEIGHT_IN,
CAST(KitProductHeightMm AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_PRODUCT_HEIGHT_MM,
KitProductPageURL AS KIT_PRODUCT_PAGE_URL,
CAST(KitProductWidthIn AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_PRODUCT_WIDTH_IN,
CAST(KitProductWidthMm AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_PRODUCT_WIDTH_MM,
KitPurchaseType AS KIT_PURCHASE_TYPE,
KitRetailBrandNameKey AS KIT_RETAIL_BRAND_NAME_KEY,
KitRetailRoomKey AS KIT_RETAIL_ROOM_KEY,
KitRetailTypeKey AS KIT_RETAIL_TYPE_KEY,
KitRollOverimage AS KIT_ROLL_OVER_IMAGE,
CAST(KitSalesCategoryCodeKey as nvarchar(256)) AS KIT_SALES_CATEG_CODE_KEY,
KitScene7ImageSet AS KIT_SCENE7_IMAGE_SET,
KitSeats AS KIT_SEATS,
KitSelllingCountries AS KIT_SELLLING_COUNTRIES,
KitSeriesNumber AS KIT_SERIES_NUMBER,
KitSeriesRetailSalesCategoryKey AS KIT_SERIES_RT_SL_CAT_KEY,
KitShippableUomKey AS KIT_SHIPPABLE_UOM_KEY,
CAST(KitShippingDepthIn AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_SHIPPING_DEPTH_IN,
CAST(KitShippingDepthMm AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_SHIPPING_DEPTH_MM,
CAST(KitShippingHeightIn AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_SHIPPING_HEIGHT_IN,
CAST(KitShippingHeightMm AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_SHIPPING_HEIGHT_MM,
CAST(KitShippingWidthIn AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_SHIPPING_WIDTH_IN,
CAST(KitShippingWidthMm AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_SHIPPING_WIDTH_MM,
KitShowroomMarketStatus AS KIT_SHOWROOM_MKT_STATUS,
CAST(KitSourceID AS int) AS KIT_SOURCE_ID,
CAST(KitStandAloneFlag as nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_STAND_ALONE_FLAG,
KitStatus AS KIT_STATUS,
KitStatusChanged AS KIT_STATUS_CHANGED,
CAST(KitStatusKey as nvarchar(256)) AS KIT_STATUS_KEY,
CAST(KitSuppWeightNetWeightKg AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_SUPP_WT_NET_WT_KG,
CAST(KitSuppWeightNetWeightLbs AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_SUPP_WT_NET_WT_LBS,
CAST(KitSupplierDirectShipOnly AS nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_SUPPLIER_DT_SHIP_ONLY,
CAST(KitThirdPartyKit AS nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_THIRD_PARTY_KIT,
CAST(KitTrackingPiece AS nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_TRACKING_PIECE,
KitTrademarkText AS KIT_TRADEMARK_TEXT,
KitType AS KIT_TYPE,
CAST(KitUnitWeightKg AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_UNIT_WEIGHT_KG,
CAST(KitUnitWeightLbs AS DECIMAL(20,5)) AS KIT_UNIT_WEIGHT_LBS,
KitUomKey AS KIT_UOM_KEY,
KitUPC AS KIT_UPC,
KitUpholsteryCover AS KIT_UPHOLSTERY_COVER,
CAST(KitValidationComplete AS nvarchar(10)) AS KIT_VALIDATION_COMPLETE,
KitVendorName AS KIT_VENDOR_NAME,
KitWholesaleAssemblyVideo1 AS KIT_WHOLESALE_ASM_VIDEO1,
CAST(LastModifiedDateTimeUtc as datetime) AS LAST_MOD_DATE_TIME_UTC,
SeriesID AS SERIES_ID,
CAST(SeriesKey AS int) AS SERIES_KEY
from [Retail].[EDWProductKit]

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'ProductMain' AS B_CLASSNAME,
id AS PRODUCT_MAIN_ID,
SourceId AS SOURCE_ID,
Status AS STATUS,
LastModifiedDateTimeUtc AS LAST_MOD_DATE_TIME_UTC,
SystemTimestamp AS SYSTEM_TIMESTAMP,
AlternateDescription2 AS ALTERNATE_DESCRIPTION2,
ItemAFIImageSet AS ITEM_AFI_IMAGE_SET,
ItemAlternateAFIFluff1 AS ITEM_ALTERNATE_AFI_FLUFF1,
ItemAlternateDescription3 AS ITEM_ALTER_DESC3,
ItemARVRReady AS ITEM_ARVR_READY,
ItemAssemblyInstructionsInternal AS ITEM_ASM_INSTR_INTERNAL,
ItemAssemblyInstructionsPublic AS ITEM_ASM_INSTR_PUBLIC,
ItemBoxQty AS ITEM_BOX_QTY,
ItemCartonDepthIn AS ITEM_CARTON_DEPTH_IN,
ItemCartonDepthMm AS ITEM_CARTON_DEPTH_MM,
ItemCartonHeightIn AS ITEM_CARTON_HEIGHT_IN,
ItemCartonHeightMm AS ITEM_CARTON_HEIGHT_MM,
ItemCartonWidthIn AS ITEM_CARTON_WIDTH_IN,
ItemCartonWidthMm AS ITEM_CARTON_WIDTH_MM,
ItemClass AS ITEM_CLASS,
ItemCode AS ITEM_CODE,
ItemColor AS ITEM_COLOR,
ItemColorSwatch AS ITEM_COLOR_SWATCH,
ItemCommodity AS ITEM_COMMODITY,
ItemComponentQuantity AS ITEM_COMPONENT_QUANTITY,
ItemConsumerAssembly AS ITEM_CONSUMER_ASSEMBLY,
ItemCubesFt AS ITEM_CUBES_FT,
ItemCubesM AS ITEM_CUBES_M,
ItemDead AS ITEM_DEAD,
ItemDimensionSketch AS ITEM_DIMENSION_SKETCH,
ItemDiningChairQtyCtn AS ITEM_DINING_CHAIR_QTY_CTN,
ItemEngineeringDivision AS ITEM_ENGINEERING_DIVISION,
ItemExclusive AS ITEM_EXCLUSIVE,
ItemExclusiveComment AS ITEM_EXCLUSIVE_COMMENT,
ItemExpressShip AS ITEM_EXPRESS_SHIP,
ItemFOBBasePrice AS ITEM_FOB_BASE_PRICE,
ItemForecastPlannerID AS ITEM_FORECAST_PLANNER_ID,
ItemFriendlyDimensions AS ITEM_FRIENDLY_DIMENSIONS,
ItemFutureStatus AS ITEM_FUTURE_STATUS,
ItemGeneralDescriptionID AS ITEM_GNRL_DESC_ID,
ItemGeneralLongDescription AS ITEM_GNRL_LONG_DESC,
ItemGoogleTitle AS ITEM_GOOGLE_TITLE,
ItemHomeStoreAssemblyVideo1 AS ITEM_HOMSTORE_ASM_VIDEO1,
CAST(ItemHTSCode AS Decimal(10,0)) AS ITEM_HTS_CODE,
ItemImportDomestic AS ITEM_IMPORT_DOMESTIC,
ItemKeyItem AS ITEM_KEY_ITEM,
ItemKnockout AS ITEM_KNOCKOUT,
ItemMaterialReferenceNeeded AS ITEM_MTERIAL_REF_NEEDED,
ItemMfgWarranty AS ITEM_MFG_WARRANTY,
ItemNumber AS ITEM_NUMBER,
ItemPhoto AS ITEM_PHOTO,
ItemProductDepthIn AS ITEM_PRODUCT_DEPTH_IN,
ItemProductDepthMm AS ITEM_PRODUCT_DEPTH_MM,
ItemProductHeightIn AS ITEM_PRODUCT_HEIGHT_IN,
ItemProductHeightMm AS ITEM_PRODUCT_HEIGHT_MM,
ItemProductPageURL AS ITEM_PRODUCT_PAGE_URL,
ItemProductWidthIn AS ITEM_PRODUCT_WIDTH_IN,
ItemProductWidthMm AS ITEM_PRODUCT_WIDTH_MM,
ItemRetailBrandName AS ITEM_RETAIL_BRAND_NAME,
ItemRetailType AS ITEM_RETAIL_TYPE,
ItemRollOverimage AS ITEM_ROLL_OVERIMAGE,
ItemSalesCategoryCode AS ITEM_SALES_CATEGORY_CODE,
ItemScene7ImageSet AS ITEM_SCENE7_IMAGE_SET,
ItemSeats AS ITEM_SEATS,
ItemSeriesName AS ITEM_SERIES_NAME,
ItemSeriesNumber AS ITEM_SERIES_NUMBER,
ItemStandAloneFlag AS ITEM_STAND_ALONE_FLAG,
ItemStatus AS ITEM_STATUS,
ItemStatusChanged AS ITEM_STATUS_CHANGED,
ItemSupplierDirectShipOnly AS ITEM_SUPP_DT_SHIP_ONLY,
ItemSuppWeightNetWeightKg AS ITEM_SUPP_WET_NET_WET_KG,
ItemSuppWeightNetWeightLbs AS ITEM_SUPP_WET_NET_WET_LBS,
ItemThirdPartyItem AS ITEM_THIRD_PARTY_ITEM,
ItemTrackingPiece AS ITEM_TRACKING_PIECE,
ItemTrademarkText AS ITEM_TRADEMARK_TEXT,
ItemType AS ITEM_TYPE,
ItemUnitWeightKg AS ITEM_UNIT_WEIGHT_KG,
ItemUnitWeightLbs AS ITEM_UNIT_WEIGHT_LBS,
ItemUPC AS ITEM_UPC,
ItemValidationComplete AS ITEM_VALIDATION_COMPLETE,
ItemWholesaleAssemblyVideo1 AS ITEM_WHOLESALE_ASM_VIDEO1,
ItemAFIFeatureBullet1 AS ITEM_AFI_FEATURE_BULLET1,
ItemAFIFeatureBullet2 AS ITEM_AFI_FEATURE_BULLET2,
ItemAFIFeatureBullet3 AS ITEM_AFI_FEATURE_BULLET3,
ItemAFIFeatureBullet4 AS ITEM_AFI_FEATURE_BULLET4,
ItemAFIFeatureBullet5 AS ITEM_AFI_FEATURE_BULLET5,
ItemAFIFeatureBullet6 AS ITEM_AFI_FEATURE_BULLET6,
ItemAFIFeatureBullet7 AS ITEM_AFI_FEATURE_BULLET7,
ItemConsumerDescription AS ITEM_CONSUMER_DESCRIPTION,
ItemFluffAFI AS ITEM_FLUFF_AFI,
ItemFluffPrint AS ITEM_FLUFF_PRINT,
ItemFriendlyDescription AS ITEM_FRIENDLY_DESCRIPTION,
ItemHomeStoreFeatureBullet1 AS ITEM_HOMESTORE_FT_BULLET1,
ItemHomeStoreFeatureBullet2 AS ITEM_HOMESTORE_FT_BULLET2,
ItemHomeStoreFeatureBullet3 AS ITEM_HOMESTORE_FT_BULLET3,
ItemHomeStoreFeatureBullet4 AS ITEM_HOMESTORE_FT_BULLET4,
ItemHomeStoreFeatureBullet5 AS ITEM_HOMESTORE_FT_BULLET5,
ItemHomeStoreFeatureBullet6 AS ITEM_HOMESTORE_FT_BULLET6,
ItemHomeStoreFeatureBullet7 AS ITEM_HOMESTORE_FT_BULLET7,
ItemHomeStoreFeatureBullet8 AS ITEM_HOMESTORE_FT_BULLET8,
ItemHomestoreItemFluff AS ITEM_HOMESTORE_ITEM_FLUFF,
SeriesAshleyHomestore AS SERIES_ASHLEY_HOMESTORE,
SeriesCorporateOnlineSelling AS SERIES_CORP_ONLINE_SELLNG,
SeriesDivision AS SERIES_DIVISION,
SeriesExclusiveComment AS SERIES_EXCLUSIVE_COMMENT,
SeriesFeatures AS SERIES_FEATURES,
SeriesId AS SERIES_ID,
SeriesInternationalHomeStore AS SERIES_INTERNATIONAL_HS,
SeriesIntroDate AS SERIES_INTRO_DATE,
SeriesMainImage AS SERIES_MAIN_IMAGE,
SeriesName AS SERIES_NAME,
SeriesNumber AS SERIES_NUMBER,
SeriesRetailSalesCategory AS SERIES_RETAIL_SALES_CATEG,
SeriesShowroom AS SERIES_SHOWROOM,
SeriesSourceId AS SERIES_SOURCE_ID,
SeriesStatus AS SERIES_STATUS,
SeriesStyle AS SERIES_STYLE,
SeriesThirdParty AS SERIES_THIRD_PARTY,
SeriesPrimary AS SERIES_PRIMARY,
ItemUomKey AS ITEM_UOM_KEY,
ItemShippableUomKey AS ITEM_SHIPPABLE_UOM_KEY,
ItemEligibleforProtectionPlan AS ITEM_ELIG_PROTECTION_PLAN,
ItemIsProtectionPlan AS ITEM_IS_PROTECTION_PLAN,
ItemAshcommDeliveryMode AS ITEM_ASHCOMM_DLVR_MODE,
ItemMaterial AS ITEM_MATERIAL,
ItemHomeStoreProductLine AS ITEM_HS_PRODUCT_LINE,
ItemEcomMerchantNotes AS ITEM_ECOM_MERCHANT_NOTES,
ItemAmazonBrandOwner AS ITEM_AMAZON_BRAND_OWNER,
ItemLifestyleDescription AS ITEM_LIFESTYLE_DESC
from [Retail].[EDWProduct]

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'ProductPackage' AS B_CLASSNAME,
PackageID AS PACKAGE_ID,
PackageKey AS PACKAGE_KEY,
HomestorePackageId AS HOMESTORE_PACKAGE_ID,
LastModifiedDateTimeUtc AS LAST_MOD_DATE_TIME_UTC,
CreatedDateTimeUtc AS CREATED_DATE_TIME_UTC,
PackageNumber AS PACKAGE_NUMBER,
PackageAlternatePackageName AS PACKAGE_ALTER_NAME,
PackageHero AS PACKAGE_HERO,
PackageStatus AS PACKAGE_STATUS,
PackageStatusChanged AS PACKAGE_STATUS_CHANGED,
PackageIsThirdParty AS PACKAGE_IS_THIRD_PARTY,
PackageHomestorePackageId AS PACKAGE_HOMESTORE_ID,
PackageWholesaleID AS PACKAGE_WHOLESALE_ID,
PackageRetailType AS PACKAGE_RETAIL_TYPE,
PackageItemQuantity AS PACKAGE_ITEM_QUANTITY,
PackageUOM AS PACKAGE_UOM,
PackageColor AS PACKAGE_COLOR,
PackageKnockout AS PACKAGE_KNOCKOUT,
PackageScene7ImageSet AS PACKAGE_SCENE7_IMAGE_SET,
PackageValidationComplete AS PACKAGE_VALIDAT_COMPLETE,
PackageValidationNotes AS PACKAGE_VALIDATION_NOTES,
PackageRolloverImage AS PACKAGE_ROLLOVER_IMAGE,
PackageExpressShip AS PACKAGE_EXPRESS_SHIP,
PackageSupplierDirectShipOnly AS PACKAGE_SUPP_DT_SHIP_ONLY,
PackageSalesCategoryCode AS PACKAGE_SALES_CATEG_CODE,
PackageSeriesNumber AS PACKAGE_SERIES_NUMBER,
PackageSeriesName AS PACKAGE_SERIES_NAME,
PackageCode AS PACKAGE_CODE,
PackageAshcommTransition AS PACKAGE_ASHCOM_TRANSITION,
PackageSwatchGroupID AS PACKAGE_SWATCH_GROUP_ID,
PackageDefaultProduct AS PACKAGE_DEFAULT_PRODUCT,
PackageNewFlagDate AS PACKAGE_NEW_FLAG_DATE,
PackageAshcommDeliveryMode AS PACKAGE_ASHCOMM_DLVR_MODE,
PackageChannelChange AS PACKAGE_CHANNEL_CHANGE,
PackageExclusive AS PACKAGE_EXCLUSIVE,
PackageHotSpotsNeedReview AS PACKAGE_HOT_SPOTS_REVIEW,
PackageAlternateDescription1 AS PACKAGE_ALT_DESC1,
PackageAshcommTitleOverride AS PACKAGE_ASH_TTL_OVERRIDE,
PackageHiddenField AS PACKAGE_HIDDEN_FIELD,
PackageConsumerChoice AS PACKAGE_CONSUMER_CHOICE,
PackageTotalAssemblyTime AS PACKAGE_TOTAL_ASM_TIME,
PackageAshcommFlags AS PACKAGE_ASHCOMM_FLAGS,
PackageNavigableCategories AS PACKAGE_NAVIGABLE_CATEG,
PackageName AS PACKAGE_NAME,
PackageAFIFluff AS PACKAGE_AFI_FLUFF,
PackageHomestorePackageFluff AS PACKAGE_HS_PACKAGE_FLUFF,
PackageAFIBullets1 AS PACKAGE_AFI_BULLETS1,
PackageAFIBullets2 AS PACKAGE_AFI_BULLETS2,
PackageAFIBullets3 AS PACKAGE_AFI_BULLETS3,
PackageAFIBullets4 AS PACKAGE_AFI_BULLETS4,
PackageAFIBullets5 AS PACKAGE_AFI_BULLETS5,
PackageAFIBullets6 AS PACKAGE_AFI_BULLETS6,
PackageHomeStoreBullets1 AS PACKAGE_HOMESTORE_BULLET1,
PackageHomeStoreBullets2 AS PACKAGE_HOMESTORE_BULLET2,
PackageHomeStoreBullets3 AS PACKAGE_HOMESTORE_BULLET3,
PackageHomeStoreBullets4 AS PACKAGE_HOMESTORE_BULLET4,
PackageHomeStoreBullets5 AS PACKAGE_HOMESTORE_BULLET5,
PackageHomeStoreBullets6 AS PACKAGE_HOMESTORE_BULLET6
FROM [Retail].[EDWProductPackage]

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'masterDataHub_Retail'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'ProducMastertLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'ProducMastertLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT
